# gitlab-v1alpha1_run_gitlab_pipeline (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) name of the RunGitlabPipeline
- `namespace` (String) the namespace scope in which to operate

### Optional

- `spec` (Attributes) spec defines the desired state of RunGitlabPipeline (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

### Read-Only

- `alarms` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))
- `api_version` (String)
- `deviations` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deviations))
- `kind` (String)
- `metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `status` (Attributes) status defines the observed state of RunGitlabPipeline (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status))

<a id="nestedatt--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec`

Optional:

- `instance` (String) Gitlab instance name.
- `parameters` (Attributes List) Parameters to pass to the workflow. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec--parameters))
- `pipeline` (String) Pipeline to run.
- `ref` (String) Reference is the branch, tag or commit hash to run the workflow.
- `repo` (String) Repository to run the workflow.

Optional:
